name: Robotics Team
description: Robotics team uses a modular robotics platform to conceive, build, and compete in a FIRST-designed game. We design, build, and program robots, get hands-on programming and rapid-prototyping experience, apply real-world math and science concepts, document the engineering process, and develop problem-solving, organizational, and team-building skills.

announcements.title: Meetings
announcements.description: Robotics meetings take place on Monday and Wednesday in room 109.
